title: College Guy Cookbook
description: Put your best foot forward. Loafers are cool, and give the impression you haven't been expelled yet. It's not exactly a workboot. She'll think you're working on your PhD, whatever that is. Don't hurt yourself. Stay away from the turnovers. Most bad teams make too many mistakes, through penalties, fumbles, and interceptions. Stay away from those, because, remember, you are in need of, or want, a girlfriend.
author: John Blandly
